task.summary:
Original commit.
This commit is focused on providing interfaces that allow User to define his custom games.
Added a skeleton of a layout tree
- Added some basic prototypes of network module - Added color clues in demo version
- Added some basic prototypes of network module - Added color clues in demo version - Added unit tests for repository layer + LocalSolutionTicketService
- Added some basic prototypes of network module - Added color clues in demo version - Added unit tests for repository layer + LocalSolutionTicketService

Merged local development branch, which includes: - Implemented ReplicaClient and Replica interfaces - Implemented a web like architecture - Added an offline sudoku demonstration application - Provided a bunch of utilities for byte encoded data - Implemented a network layer - Implemented a pbft thread

MESSAGE.value:
Original commit.
This commit is focused on providing interfaces that allow User to define his custom games.
Added a skeleton of a layout tree
- Added some basic prototypes of network module - Added color clues in demo version
- Added some basic prototypes of network module - Added color clues in demo version - Added unit tests for repository layer + LocalSolutionTicketService

- Implemented ReplicaClient and Replica interfaces - Implemented a web like architecture - Added an offline sudoku demonstration application - Provided a bunch of utilities for byte encoded data - Implemented a network layer

Merged local development branch, which includes: - Implemented ReplicaClient and Replica interfaces - Implemented a web like architecture - Added an offline sudoku demonstration application - Provided a bunch of utilities for byte encoded data - Implemented a network layer - Implemented a pbft thread
